SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AckResponse
Generic event that represents the success or failure of the action.
Card
Card is the class that represents all the generic card (playable and starting) that compose game board.
CardColor
CardColor is an enumeration that lists all kind of color of the cards of Codex Naturalis, with the addition of white color used to indicate starting cards.
CardComponent
describes the cards contained in the PlayedCardsPanel
ChatAck
Ack for chat messages.
ChatMessage
Class representing a chat message.
ChatPanel
the panel that contains chat between all players and between only two players.
ChooseNickname
Event that represent the client choice of a nickname
ChooseObjectiveRequest
event that represent the model request to choose between 2 objective card.
ChooseObjectiveResponse
Event that represent the response of the client to a choose objective request.
Client
Interface that describes the server structure.
ClientApp
Class that define the application client side.
ClientImpl
Class representing a client instance.
ClientRegister
event that represent a client request to connect to the server
ClientSkeleton
Class representing the client for socket connections.
Controller
Class that represents the controller in the MVC pattern.
ControllerTest
 
Corner
Corner class represents a generic corner of a card with all of his properties.
CurrentResources
Class that contains the information about the resources owned by the player
CurrentResourcesTest
 
Deck
Abstract class that handles all the methods of all kinds of deck in the game.
DrawCardRequest
Event that represent the model request for a source for the draw of a card.
DrawCardResponse
Event that represent the client response to a draw card request
EndGameTriggered
Event that represent the trigger of the end game
EndTurn
Event that represent the end of a player's turn
ErrorJoinLobby
Event that represent an error in joining the pre-game lobby
FinalRankings
Event that represent the end of the game and its final rankings
Game
Class that manages the game life cycle, from the start to end.
GameTest
 
GameView
represent the game info in a certain moment like a screenshot.
GenericEvent
Generic event that represents an action that it's used in the client-server communication.
GenericRequest
Class representing a generic request event.
GenericResponse
Class representing a generic response event.
GoldCard
GoldCards represents the gold cards, it extends playable card because playable cards are composed by gold and resource cards.
GoldDeck
GoldDeck is the class that represents gold deck in the game, it extends deck because it uses some of the methods and attributes of that class.
GUI
Represent the logic behind the connection between the server and the client's graphic interface
Hand
Class that contains player's hand and his played cards.
HandFullException
Exception that is thrown when a draw is requested but the hand is full This situation should never happen
HandTest
 
HandView
Represent the hand of a player in a certain moment
ImageDialog
Class that represent a dialog that allows to choose between two shown images
isEmptyException
Exception that is thrown when a draw is requested on an empty deck Exception will be handled by the controller, may cause EndGame()
JoinLobby
Event that represent the successful join of the pre-game lobby of a player
Listener
represent a generic listener that works like an intermediary in a connection
Lobby
Class that represents the waiting lobby before the game starts.
Logger
Class that prints on the server the most important operations such as sending/receiving events or some warning/failure.
MainFrame
represent the frame for the graphic UI.
ModelViewListener
Listener from model to view, i.e., server to client.
NumPlayersRequest
Event that represent the request to set the number of players for the game
NumPlayersResponse
Event that represent the response to a request to set the number of players for the game
ObjectiveCard
ObjectiveCard is the abstract class that encodes the objective cards in the game.
ObjectiveCard1
ObjectiveCard1 represents the first type of objectives, those that add points to your score when positional requirements are satisfied.
ObjectiveCard2
ObjectiveCard2 represents the second type of objective, those that add points to your score if the number of resources required is present on your game board.
ObjectiveDeck
ObjectiveDeck is the class that represents the Deck that contains all the objective cards.
PersonalPanel
Class that represent the panel of the player that owns the frame
PlaceStartingCard
Events that represent the action of placing the starting card
PlayableCard
Playable Card is an abstract class that represents only playable cards so only gold and resource cards.
PlayCardRequest
Event that represent the model request to play a card to a player
PlayCardResponse
Event that represent the response to a request to play a card
PlayedCardsPanel
the panel that contains all the played cards of the player
Player
Class that contains player's information and game items
PlayerDisconnected
event that communicate to the other players that someone has disconnected/reconnected
PlayerNotFoundException
exception that is thrown when a player cant be found
PlayerPanel
panel with scroll bars that contains the playedCardPanel
PlayerView
Represent the player's info in a certain moment
Position
Position represents position of a corner in a generic card.
ReconnectionRequest
when a player enter a nickname of a disconnected player a possibility of reconnection is communicated through this event
ReconnectionResponse
Response to a reconnection request, the player enter his password to complete the reconnection
Resource
Resource is an enumeration that represents all kind of resources tha can be used in the game.
ResourceCard
Resource Card represents the resource cards.
ResourceDeck
ResourceDeck is the class that represents resource deck in the game, it extends deck because it uses some of the methods and attributes of that class.
Scoretrack
Class containing the score track on which the tokens will be moving
ScoretrackView
Represent the situation of the score track in a certain moment
Server
Interface that describes the server structure.
ServerApp
Class that define the application server side.
ServerImpl
Class representing a server instance.
ServerMessage
Event that needs to be handled asynchronously
ServerStub
Class representing the server in socket connections.
SetPassword
Event for setting the password after joining a lobby
SetTokenColorRequest
Event that represent the model request to choose the color of the token of the player
SetTokenColorResponse
Event that represent the response to a request to choose the token color
Severity
Enumeration for classifying the severity of the server actions.
StartGame
Event that represent the notification that the game is starting
StartingCard
StartingCard is the class that represents the starting cards, that with all the playable cards creates the game board.
StartingDeck
StartingDeck class represents starting card deck.
StartTurn
Event that represent the notification that it's the turn of a player
TableCenter
Class containing the table center of the game, holding the playing card decks aswell the cards layed common for everyone.
TableCenterPanel
The panel where the game takes place, you can see both decks (Gold Deck and Resource Deck) and all the four cards on the floor from where, when the time is right, you can draw, the score track ,as well as the two community objective cards.
TableCenterTest
 
TableCenterView
Represent the table center of the game in a certain moment
Token
Class containing the token object used to move on the score track
TokenColor
Token Color is the enumeration that represents all color of tokens.
TokenTest
 
TokenView
Represent a player's token info in a certain moment
TUI
Class that handles event with respect to CLI-clients.
TurnOrder
Event that represent the notification of the turns order in the game
UI
generic interface representing the UI
View
represent a generic handler for user interface
ViewControllerListener
Listener between the player UI and the server
WrongPlayException
Exception that is thrown if the play is not valid contains the information about the play
